Reason: Press release states First Commonwealth Financial Corporation and CenterGroup Financial, Inc. jointly announced signing an Agreement and Plan of Merger for CenterGroup to merge into First Commonwealth.
Evidence Text: “First Commonwealth”) ... and CenterGroup Financial, Inc. (“CenterGroup”), the holding company for CenterBank, today jointly announced the signing of an Agreement and Plan of Merger (“Agreement”) providing for the merger of CenterGroup with and into First Commonwealth

Reason: Press release explains that after CenterGroup merges into First Commonwealth, CenterBank will merge into First Commonwealth Bank.
Evidence Text: Following the merger of CenterGroup with and into First Commonwealth, CenterBank will merge with and into First Commonwealth Bank.

Reason: Press release identifies First Commonwealth Financial Corporation as a NYSE-listed company (NYSE: FCF).
Evidence Text: First Commonwealth Financial Corporation (“First Commonwealth”) (NYSE: FCF)
